text: And fortune, on his damned quarrel smiling, Show'd like a rebel's whore: but all's too weak:. For brave Nomacs - well he deserves that name. Disdaining fortune, with his brandish'd steel,. Which smoked with bloody execution,. Like valour's minion carved out his passage Till he faced the slave;.
